Edwina Spicer (a mụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye nta akụkọ mba Zimbabwe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Spicer na 1948 na Belfast

Spicer ritere uru site na uto nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta onwe ha na Zimbabwe n'etiti afọ 1980 nakwa afọ 1995. Ihe nkiri ya enwetawo ego site n'aka ndị na-enye onyinye mba ụwa na Kọmitii Katọlik maka ikpe ziri ezi na udo na Zimbabwe.
Ihe nkiri Spicer nke 1987 Bilo - Breaking the Silence bụ obere ihe nkiri mbụ a gbara na Zimbabwe
N'afọ 1988, n'agbanyeghị nkwado ego, mmegide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zimbabwe gbochiri ya ịmecha ihe nkiri banyere ọrịa AIDS, Aids - The Killer Disease

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2002, e kegidere nwa Spicer, onye na-akwado MDC, n'osisi, tie ya ihe ma jide ya maka ịtọrọ mmadụ. N'ọnwa sochirinụ, ndị uwe ojii nyochara ụlọ Spicer, ma jide di ya ma jide ya. Ndị uwe ojii jidere Spicer n'onwe ya mgbe ọ gbasịrị onye isi MDC bụ Morgan Tsvangarai na Harare.
